item.title: Generalizing Selfish Mining's Gamma
item.description: TL;DR: We discuss a popular network assumption made in the Selfish Mining literature against Nakamoto consensus. We derive an equivalent but more general network assumption which can be used with any protocol and other attacks than Selfish Mining. Selfish Mining’s Gamma Parameter # In their original work on Selfish Mining against Nakamoto consensus, Eyal and Sirer (2014) make the following network assumption. What they refer to as «selfish pool» would be called attacker in our notation.
